patterns_discovered.description: Consistent approach to migrating React components from hardcoded strings to i18n translations
steps: Import useTranslation hook from react-i18next with common namespace
Extract all hardcoded strings as translation keys
Use t() function with dot-notation for nested keys (meetings.title, approvals.pending)
Support dynamic content via mustache template syntax ({{variable}})
Maintain parallel translations in en.json and he.json
